title: Analysis of COVID-19 Vaccination Effectiveness: Data-Driven Modeling and Machine Learning Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers: acquiring vaccine efficacy evaluation methods through real data analysis and scenario-based learning in VR environments

learning_goals: Analyze the impact of vaccination rates on infection curves using a modified SIR epidemic model.
Evaluate the effects of vaccine efficacy and vaccination speed on the Brazilian case study by applying machine learning algorithms.
Design virtual vaccine distribution strategies using simulation tools and derive conditions for achieving herd immunity.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
